column2: What does this mean going forward regarding midterms and 2024?
column5: www.realclearpolitics.com/… projects.fivethirtyeight.com/…  Joe Biden’s approval rating is fixed as well as his disapproval rating.  It appears to me that Biden’s maximum approval can be 60% within 4 years.  The lowest disapproval rating is going to be 37%.  Our electorate is beyond polarized.
